title: post_to_database Lambda Input (update_file)
description: The input for the post_to_database Lambda when updating the status for a file.

job_id.description: The unique ID of the asyncOperation.

granule_id.description: The unique ID of the granule to retrieve status for.

filename.description: The name and extension of the file.

last_update.description: The last time the file's status changed, in UTC and iso-format.

completion_time.description: The time the restore was completed, in UTC and iso-format.

status_id.description: The status_id of the restoration of the file.

error_message.description: If the restoration of the file errored, the error will be stored here.
